diff_act: 1.Provide a clear indication to the controller when a driver is disconnected.
2.display the controller's identity in the lead cab

regen.absent_element: indication to the controller when a driver is disconnected from the call
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a clear indication to the controller when a driver is disconnected from the multi-driver call.

regen.absent_element: display of the controller's identity in lead cab when initiated by the controller
regen.new_specification: When the controller initiates a call, the controllerâ€™s identity shall be displayed in the lead cab for clarity and verification.

regen.absent_element: displaying the controller's identity in the lead cab
regen.new_specification: The system shall display the controller's identity in the lead cab when the controller is part of the call.

label: Functional identity of the automatically added controller shall be displayed in the leading cab.
absence: display the identity of the automatically added controller
